All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Cigarettes
A class representing cigarettes as a product.
Controller
An abstract class that serves as a base for controllers in the application.
ControllerEnterUsernameMenu
A controller for managing username input in the application menu.
ControllerHighscoreMenu
A controller for managing highscore menu interactions in the application.
ControllerLanguageMenu
A controller for managing language selection in the application menu.
ControllerMainMenu
The ControllerMainMenu class handles the main menu interactions.
ControllerSimulation
The abstract ControllerSimulation class provides common functionality for all simulation controllers in the kiosk simulation.
ControllerSimulationDayMenu
The ControllerSimulationDayMenu class manages the interactions between the view and the simulation model for the daily menu in the kiosk simulation.
ControllerSimulationEndMenu
Controller for the end menu of the simulation.
ControllerSimulationMarketMenu
The ControllerSimulationMarketMenu class manages the interactions between the view and the simulation model for the market menu in the kiosk simulation.
ControllerSimulationMenu
The ControllerSimulationMenu class manages the interactions between the view and the simulation model for the main simulation menu in the kiosk simulation.
ControllerSimulationPriceMenu
The ControllerSimulationPriceMenu class manages the interactions between the view and the simulation model for the price menu in the kiosk simulation.
ControllerSimulationStorageMenu
The ControllerSimulationStorageMenu class extends ControllerSimulation and manages the storage of products in a simulation.
Customer
A class representing a customer.
Fries
Fries class represents a type of product that extends the Product class.
Gum
A class representing gum as a product.
Highscore
The Highscore class manages a list of high scores, reading from and writing to a file.
IceCream
A class representing ice cream as a product.
InterfaceController
The InterfaceController interface provides a method for setting user input in the controller.
InterfaceView
The InterfaceView interface provides the methods for printing and getting input from the view.
JUnitTest
JUnit tests for the Kiosk simulation.
Kiosk
A class representing a kiosk.
Lemonade
A class representing lemonade as a product.
Main
The main class of the application.
Market
The Market class simulates a market with various product prices influenced by weather conditions and random variations.
Newspaper
A class representing newspapers as a product.
Product
An abstract class representing a product.
Simulation
The Simulation class represents a simulation of a market kiosk.
Simulation.BuyProductResponse
Enum representing the response of buying a product.
Translation
A class that manages translations for different languages.
View
The abstract View class provides basic functionalities for printing and handling input in the view.
ViewEnterUsernameMenu
The ViewEnterUsernameMenu class handles the view for entering a username in the simulation.
ViewHighscoreMenu
The ViewHighscoreMenu class handles the view for displaying highscores in the simulation.
ViewLanguageMenu
The ViewLanguageMenu class handles the view for selecting a language in the simulation.
ViewMainMenu
The ViewMainMenu class handles the main menu view of the simulation.
ViewManager
The ViewManager class is responsible for managing the different views and their controllers in the application.
ViewSimulation
Abstract class representing a simulation view.
ViewSimulationDayMenu
The ViewSimulationDayMenu class handles the view for each simulation day in the kiosk simulation.
ViewSimulationEndMenu
The ViewSimulationEndMenu class handles the view for the end of the simulation in the kiosk simulation.
ViewSimulationMarketMenu
The ViewSimulationMarketMenu class handles the view for the market menu in the kiosk simulation.
ViewSimulationMenu
The ViewSimulationMenu class handles the main simulation menu view in the kiosk simulation.
ViewSimulationPriceMenu
The ViewSimulationPriceMenu class handles the view for setting product prices in the kiosk simulation.
ViewSimulationStorageMenu
The ViewSimulationStorageMenu class handles the view for the storage menu in the kiosk simulation.
